title: National Assembly By- Election (Katuba Constituency No. 01) (Election Date and Time of Poll) (No. 3) Order, 2019
content:
Supplement to the Republic of Zambia Government 259
Gazette dated Friday, 7th June, 2019
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
STATUTORY INSTRUMENT NO.38 OF2019
The Electoral Process Act, 2016
(ActNo.35of2016)
The Electoral Process (General) Regulations, 2016
The National Assembly By-Election (Katuba Constituency
No. 01) (Election Date and Time of Poll)
(No. 3) Order, 2019
WHEREASinpursuanceofArticle72(8)oftheConstitution,the Cap.1
Speaker of the National Assembly has informed the Electoral
Commission of Zambia of the vacancy in respect of Katuba
Constituency No. 01 by reason of the death of Hon. Patricia
Mwashingwele,MemberofParliamentforKatubaConstituency,
and the declaration by the Speaker of the NationalAssembly of
thevacancyoftheParliamentaryseatoftheKatubaConstituency:
NOWTHEREFORE,inexerciseofthe powerscontainedinArticle
57 (3) of the Constitution andRegulation 15(1) of the Electoral Cap.1
Process(General)Regulations,2016,the followingOrderismade:
1. This Order may be cited as the National Assembly By- Title
Election (Katuba ConstituencyNo. 01) (ElectionDate andTime
ofPoll)(No.3)Order,2019.
2. A candidate for election as a Member of Parliament for Nominations
forelections
Katuba Constituency No. 01 shall lodge a nomination with the
ReturningOfficeronThursday,11thJuly,2019,between0900hours
and1500hours.
3. The campaign period shall commence on Thursday, 11th Campaign
July,2019,at1500hoursandcloseat1800hoursonMonday,29th period
July,2019.
CopiesofthisStatutoryInstrumentcanbeobtainedfromtheGovernmentPrinter,
P.O.Box30136,10101,Lusaka,PriceK4.00 each
260 Statutory Instruments 7thJune,2019
Electiondate 4. (1) ThepollintheConstituencyreferredtoinparagraph2
andtimeof
shalltakeplaceonTuesday,30thJuly,2019,between0600hours
poll
and1800hours.
(2) A poll shall not be taken in a Constituency if only one
candidateisvalidlynominated.
Made by the Electoral Commission of Zambia at Lusaka this
5thdayofJune,2019.
JUSTICE E.E. CHULU,
Chairperson
A. C. NHEKAIRO,
Vice-Chairperson
E.J. SIKAZWE,
Member
A. D. SIMWINGA,
Member
LUSAKA
5thJune,2019
[EC.101/5/5CONF.]
